item.title: Securinets CTF 2025
item.author: xxx@example.com (Diep Manh Tuan)
item.description:
Securinets CTF 2025

Author: Diep Manh Tuan(xxx@example.com)

SecurinetsCTF 2025 event link: https://quals.securinets.tn/

Securinets CTF 2025 – Silent Visitor

Challenge name: Silent Visitor Difficulty: Easy Describe: A user reported suspicious activity on their Windows workstation. Can you investigate the incident and uncover what really happened? author: Enigma522 link chall: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-nrWp4YFP0ULqQAHS2JNWzeLPyeiKbgQ/view?usp=sharing

Question 1:

What is the SHA256 hash of the disk image provided?

  • Given the provided disk image test.ad1, the task was to determine its SHA-256 hash. I computed it with:
sha256sum test.ad1
  • answer:
122b2b4bf1433341ba6e8fefd707379a98e6e9ca376340379ea42edb31a5dba2

Question 2:

Identify the OS build number of the victim’s system?

Published on 2025-10-06 at Welcome to my blog, last modified on 2025-10-06

item.title: Holmes CTF 2025
item.author: xxx@example.com (Diep Manh Tuan)
item.description:
Holmes CTF 2025

Author: Diep Manh Tuan(xxx@example.com)

Holmes CTF 2025 – The Card

Holmes CTF 2025 Event Link: https://ctf.hackthebox.com/event/2536
Challenge name: The Card
Difficulty: Easy
Describe: Holmes receives a breadcrumb from Dr. Nicole Vale – fragments from a string of cyber incidents across Cogwork-1. Each lead ends the same way: a digital calling card signed JM.

Question 1

Analyze the provided logs and identify what is the first User-Agent used by the attacker against Nicole Vale’s honeypot. (string)

Published on 2025-09-27 at Welcome to my blog, last modified on 2025-09-27
